p: The HI is used widely to measure population levels however the index does not consider the effects from the number of positive containers or the productivity of those containers. The CI is also taken in to account only the proportion of water holding containers that are positive for immature stages of dengue vector mosquitoes. Meantime, the BI focus on the relationship between positive containers and households which is the most informative index compared to the HI and CI, however, still the productivity of the containers is not addressed in the BI also.
